meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of rule or government by the mob or a mass of people.
meanings.sent1: The ochlocratic decision was made by the entire group.
meanings.sent2: The ochlocratic nature of the protest led to chaos.
meanings.sent3: The ochlocratic behavior at the concert made it hard to enjoy the music.
meanings.sent4: Her ochlocratic leadership style divided the team.
meanings.sent5: The ochlocratic rule resulted in conflicting opinions and no clear direction.

meanings.definition: A system of government in which the mob or a mass of people have control or influence.
meanings.sent1: The country's ochlocratic was evident in the protests.
meanings.sent2: The ochlocratic was established after the revolution.
meanings.sent3: The ochlocratic caused delays in passing new laws.
meanings.sent4: The ochlocratic led to decisions based on popular vote.
meanings.sent5: The ochlocratic struggled to maintain order in times of crisis.
